casebody.data:
THE CHASE MANHATTAN BANK, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. EDNA B. ODIORNE, DEFENDANT-PETITIONER. Messrs. Leyden & Monaghan for the petitioner. Messrs. Pitney, Hardin & Kipp, Mr. William H. Osh orne, Jr., and Mr. Clyde A. Szuch for the respondent. April 30, 1962.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
